getCreationCode().details: Returns the creation code of the contract this factory creates.

getCreationCodeContracts().details: Returns the two addresses where the creation code of the contract created by this factory is stored.

params.newRollerPeriphery: The Roller Periphery addresss to set

setPeriphery(address).notice: Update the address for the Periphery

setRollerPeriphery(address).notice: Update the address for the Roller Periphery

setUtils(address).notice: Update the address for the Utils
